summary.para: Dynamically updates the encoder configuration with a collection of new encoder settings.

param.name: pEncodingParameters
param.para: A set of encoding parameters to configure the encoder with.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The encoder will be configured with these settings after all previously queued input media samples have been sent to it through .

summary.para: Dynamically changes the target media type that Sink Writer is encoding to.

param.name: pTargetMediaType
param.para: The new media format to encode to.

param.name: pEncodingParameters
param.para: The new set of encoding parameters to configure the encoder with. If not specified, previously provided parameters will be used.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The new media type must be supported by the media sink being used and by the encoder MFTs installed on the system.
